{"rule":"PASSIVE_VOICE","sentence":"^\\Qlabel is automatically associated with its 1st nested descendant That said, it is good practice to associate the label with it's associated element The element associated with the label (like input) may be placed outside the label but in this case, the associated element's for attr should have been associated with the id attr of the label element.\\E$"}
{"rule":"UPPERCASE_SENTENCE_START","sentence":"^\\Qlabel is automatically associated with its 1st nested descendant That said, it is good practice to associate the label with it's associated element The element associated with the label (like input) may be placed outside the label but in this case, the associated element's for attr should have been associated with the id attr of the label element.\\E$"}
{"rule":"ENGLISH_WORD_REPEAT_RULE","sentence":"^\\Qform form attr is given a unique identifier which associates the select with a form select does not need to be nested inside the form if they are already associated but it is good practice to nest the select inside it's associated form even if they are already associated by form and id attr\\E$"}
